narrow_build_vf_from_designspace.name: Narrow build (VF) from Designspace
narrow_build_vf_from_designspace.description:
Build a variable font from a designspace file that links several master UFOs.
Read all UFOs speedily, combine outline data etc. into variable font TTF.

Use-cases:
- Build final variable fonts on CI machines
- Build test variable fonts on designer's machines
- ...

fontmake_ttf.name: fontmake TTF output
fontmake_ttf.description: fontmake in its default configuration, only TTF output
